CustomField.description: I left the broadcaster reports transtiion field name the same, because I didn't want to risk messing with reports. But Broadcaster Reports Transition at Risk is the same as Outreach Reports Transition at risk. (Change made 7/17/2018, due to Mark Combs request).
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Completed by the Outreach Team if the Broadcaster reports they are at risk of missing their phase completion date. Checking the box generates a request for an analysis of the impact to our sites if the station misses its date.
CustomField.label: Outreach ReportsTransition at Risk
